ValidationRule.description: Error: Flex Ben Admin is a MPSC product, this is not an MPSC client. Case cannot be submitted. Please escalate through alternate path.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Administrator')), RecordType.Name ="Sales2Service Case", ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "Flex Ben Admin"), (NOT(BEGINS(Branch_Client_ID__c, "940") || BEGINS(Branch_Client_ID__c, "942") || BEGINS(Branch_Client_ID__c, "943") || BEGINS(Branch_Client_ID__c, "1240") || BEGINS(Branch_Client_ID__c, "1242") || BEGINS(Branch_Client_ID__c, "1243") || BEGINS(Branch_Client_ID__c, "1244") || BEGINS(Branch_Client_ID__c, "944"))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Error: Flex Ben Admin is a MPSC product, this is not an MPSC client. Case cannot be submitted. Please escalate through alternate path.
